articles.title: As online shopping booms, Amazon swoops on four ex-Qantas Boeing 767s - Executive Traveller
articles.description: The popular and long-lived jet gains a new lease of life with Amazon's own cargo airline.
articles.content:
Amazon has bought four Boeing 767s formerly flown by Qantas to bulk up its Amazon Air fleet of cargo jets.
The online retailer's fast-growing freight airline will also welcome seven Boeing 767s from… [+3699 chars]
